en_quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: Because of my father, we are that Shining City on a Hill
en_quotes.author: Michael Reagan

en_quotes.quote: The first time my mum and dad went to the theatre was at my drama school in third year

en_quotes.quote: Sons have always a rebellious wish to be disillusioned by that which charmed their fathers
en_quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

en_quotes.quote: I was built up from my dad more than anyone else
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: Fathers are biological necessities, but social accidents
en_quotes.author: Margaret Mead

en_quotes.quote: My dad was the town drunk. Most of the time that's not so bad; but New York City?
en_quotes.author: Henny Youngman

en_quotes.quote: Because I see my mum and dad as such amazing friends, I think I'll be a really good dad
en_quotes.author: Gareth Gates

en_quotes.quote: But as a kid, I loved 'Monty Python.' My Dad was a devout watcher. We used to watch it when we ate dinner!
en_quotes.author: Wes Bentley

en_quotes.quote: My dad had this old truck that he used to take on back roads and showed me how to drive when I was nine or ten
en_quotes.author: Chord Overstreet

en_quotes.quote: I would consider my dad a pretty patient guy, but there was no tolerance for spoiled behavior
en_quotes.author: Wyatt Russell

en_quotes.quote: I'm lucky to have my dad in my life. He's very brilliant, I think he's really a smart man, and he's a kind guy
en_quotes.author: Cody Horn

en_quotes.quote: The place of the father in the modern suburban family is a very small one, particularly if he plays golf
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Me and my dad are the biggest promoters of an estate tax in the US. It's not a popular position
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: My father wouldn't get us a TV, he wouldn't allow a TV in the house
en_quotes.author: Janis Joplin

en_quotes.quote: My dad grew up in Nicaragua in his teenage years, then immigrated to the United States
en_quotes.author: Rashida Tlaib

en_quotes.quote: My father was never anti-anything in our house

en_quotes.quote: My dad's family were pretty working class, actually
en_quotes.author: Dan Stevens

en_quotes.quote: I'm trying to carry on my dad's legacy, and it is tough
en_quotes.author: Bindi Irwin

en_quotes.quote: My dad was real hard on me. He wasn't really big on congratulating and stuff like that
en_quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

en_quotes.quote: My dad was a very strong man, very stubborn as well
en_quotes.author: Paul Pogba

en_quotes.quote: I think if you look at most successful people, if you ask most of them, their biggest influence was their dad
en_quotes.author: Tom Lehman

en_quotes.quote: I'm absolutely my dad's biggest fan, and anything he wanted to do, I wanted to be a part of

en_quotes.quote: Performing for my dad does drive me on. Especially in big games, massive games
en_quotes.author: Raheem Sterling

en_quotes.quote: My kids don't slow down, but they like to hang just with us, with mum and dad. They play with us and we play, too
en_quotes.author: Deborra-Lee Furness

en_quotes.quote: My dad is a huge rock n' roll lead guitar fan
en_quotes.author: Slash

en_quotes.quote: My mum was a librarian, and my dad worked in Greenland

en_quotes.quote: My dad gave me my first bike at 16. I soon fell off and was in a wheelchair for weeks. I haven't fallen since
en_quotes.author: Hugh Laurie

en_quotes.quote: Rich men's sons are seldom rich men's fathers
en_quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman

en_quotes.quote: My dad gave up his job; he stopped working - for me. Without that, I definitely wouldn't be as successful
en_quotes.author: Chloe Kim

en_quotes.quote: It is a gift to be a teenager, and I see a dad's job as lifeguard, not chaperone
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Franklin

en_quotes.quote: My dad took me to the racetrack for the first time when I was 2 or 3... Anything with a motor, that was in my blood
en_quotes.author: Lynsi Torres

en_quotes.quote: My dad is such a good man, hard-working
en_quotes.author: Kelly Reilly

en_quotes.quote: You know that family is going to be there for you no matter what. My dad gave me a freakin' kidney!
en_quotes.author: Sarah Hyland

en_quotes.quote: My dad is my heart. My family is my heart
en_quotes.author: Tua Tagovailoa

en_quotes.quote: My worldview comes from a collection of the books I have read, the people I have met, and my conversations with my dad
en_quotes.author: Brian Kilmeade

en_quotes.quote: I wanted to be a police officer for a long time so I could be just like my dad!
en_quotes.author: Doreen Cronin

en_quotes.quote: My dad is awesome
en_quotes.author: Justin Halpern

en_quotes.quote: Some of the happiest times I ever saw my dad was times when I was with him in the casinos, and he had a good night
en_quotes.author: James Packer

en_quotes.quote: My dad keeps referring to me playing the piano when he's trying to teach me something in archery
en_quotes.author: Miranda Leek

en_quotes.quote: My dad was always playing music. Not, like, playing music but listening to music
en_quotes.author: Post Malone

en_quotes.quote: When I was three years old, my dad bought me my first drum set
en_quotes.author: Travis Scott

en_quotes.quote: My father? I never knew him. Never even seen a picture of him
en_quotes.author: Eminem

en_quotes.quote: I never saw any of my dad's stories. My mother said he had piles and piles of manuscripts
en_quotes.author: Stephen King

en_quotes.quote: Boy' was about my dad
en_quotes.author: Taika Waititi

en_quotes.quote: My dad was very intelligent, had a very strong personality. I was amazed with my father
en_quotes.author: Dolores Huerta

en_quotes.quote: I want my kids to see me as Dad, for God's sake, not a television personality
en_quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay

en_quotes.quote: I love being a dad. I just love it
en_quotes.author: Jerry Seinfeld

en_quotes.quote: My dad was a big influence because he did a lot of music
en_quotes.author: Lil Skies

en_quotes.quote: I just wish I could understand my father
en_quotes.author: Michael Jackson

en_quotes.quote: I'm just a regular 24/7 dad now
en_quotes.author: Allen Iverson

en_quotes.quote: All the learnin' my father paid for was a bit o' birch at one end and an alphabet at the other
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: My dad is a marketing mastermind
en_quotes.author: Serena Williams

en_quotes.quote: Right about when I turned 13, I realized that women could be jockeys, from my travels to the racetrack with my dad

en_quotes.quote: My grandfather and my uncle both died from colorectal cancer, my dad almost died from it and I have the gene for it
en_quotes.author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

en_quotes.quote: Dad entered the Second World War like any other man, trying to do the right thing
en_quotes.author: Ridley Scott

en_quotes.quote: My dad used to play that Paul McCartney song 'Let 'Em In.' That was dope
en_quotes.author: Lil Yachty

en_quotes.quote: My dad read the Bible ten times, and I want to do it in my lifetime. But it's definitely tough getting through
en_quotes.author: Pamela Anderson

en_quotes.quote: My dad says he likes to bask in my glow
en_quotes.author: Robert Pattinson

en_quotes.quote: My dad never gave me pats on the back or congratulations. There was always more to give and more to get done
en_quotes.author: Stefon Diggs

en_quotes.quote: I think my dad is the only Arabic descendent who is an unsuccessful businessman
en_quotes.author: Shakira

en_quotes.quote: My mother and dad played the fiddle and the guitar
en_quotes.author: Gordie Howe

en_quotes.quote: My dad passed away when I was 10
en_quotes.author: Sterling K. Brown

en_quotes.quote: My dad was a very straight arrow, prayed-at-every-meal kind of guy
en_quotes.author: Chris Stapleton

en_quotes.quote: My dad was the biggest influence on my life because he was never boring
en_quotes.author: Christian Bale

en_quotes.quote: My dad was always the soldier I wanted to be
en_quotes.author: Stanley A. McChrystal

en_quotes.quote: As a kid, I had this ultimate goal to be a teacher. I wanted to be a history teacher like my dad

en_quotes.quote: My dad is a big extrovert - he's a doctor - but he always loved Shakespeare, and he took us to tons of theater

en_quotes.quote: I love being a dad. I'd do it full-time if I didn't have to make a living
en_quotes.author: Bobby Cannavale

en_quotes.quote: My dad named me after Hannibal Barca, the Carthaginian general who attacked Rome. But nobody knows about him

en_quotes.quote: He was like a real dad, you know. We used to sit down with guitars and mess around

en_quotes.quote: What harsh judges fathers are to all young men!
en_quotes.author: Terence

en_quotes.quote: Governor Pawlenty has the same conservative convictions and executive experience I admire in my dad
en_quotes.author: Sarah Huckabee Sanders

en_quotes.quote: When it comes to guys, my dad is the measure of the perfect man. And that's a pretty tough standard to match up to
en_quotes.author: Anushka Shetty

en_quotes.quote: I love eating at my dad's pub, the Queens Arms in Kilburn. It does a traditional Albanian spinach pie

en_quotes.quote: My dad was 32 in college, and my brother wore 32 in college. So I'm just going to stick with it
en_quotes.author: Blake Griffin

en_quotes.quote: I have never been a material girl. My father always told me never to love anything that cannot love you back
en_quotes.author: Imelda Marcos

en_quotes.quote: Fathers in today's modern families can be so many things
en_quotes.author: Oliver Hudson

en_quotes.quote: Just because my dad is Clint Eastwood doesn't mean I don't have to work for a living
en_quotes.author: Scott Eastwood

en_quotes.quote: My dad owned a propane company in Oklahoma
en_quotes.author: Johnny Bench

en_quotes.quote: I want to stay healthy, keep fit, eat well, keep a low profile and be a good dad
en_quotes.author: Frank Bruno

en_quotes.quote: My dad was on 'Zombieland,' and I love that movie. So yeah, I think I like the horror genre!
en_quotes.author: Chandler Riggs

en_quotes.quote: People in Finland have also adopted me because of my dad, and that's great, but it's the one language I can't speak
en_quotes.author: Nico Rosberg

en_quotes.quote: They used to say a woman would never main-event a pay-per-view. I'm pretty sure I heard that from my dad

en_quotes.quote: The most important thing I do is I'm a dad
en_quotes.author: Stuart Scott

en_quotes.quote: Despite the gender stereotypes in the '80s, my race-car-driving dad taught me that I could do whatever my brother could
en_quotes.author: Amanda de Cadenet

en_quotes.quote: As a little girl I used to daydream about my real father coming on a white horse to rescue me

en_quotes.quote: My dad is a really honest, hardworking, straight guy
en_quotes.author: Joe Lando

en_quotes.quote: I remember playing with my dad, and my kids will remember this as well
en_quotes.author: Xabi Alonso

en_quotes.quote: My dad joined Langley in 1964 as a co-op student and retired in 2004 an internationally respected climate scientist
en_quotes.author: Margot Lee Shetterly

en_quotes.quote: My dad is literally - and I love him so much - he is my number one fan
en_quotes.author: Manny Jacinto

en_quotes.quote: I love being a dad. I'd have more kids if I could. I'd take a couple more, one or two more before I croak
en_quotes.author: Richie Sambora

en_quotes.quote: My dad has always been really helpful. He taught me that talent is a bonus, but persistence is what wins out

en_quotes.quote: I had a real bad attitude after my dad passed of liver cancer. I was 9, and we were really close
en_quotes.author: John Wall

en_quotes.quote: I learned from my dad that change and experimentation are constants and important. You have to keep trying new things
en_quotes.author: S. Robson Walton

en_quotes.quote: My dad's an ex-policeman, and my mum is a sales representative, and they haven't got the acting bug. Bless them
en_quotes.author: Olivia Cooke

en_quotes.quote: My dad told me, 'It takes fifteen years to be an overnight success', and it took me seventeen and a half years
en_quotes.author: Adrien Brody

en_quotes.quote: I'm gonna be the best dad that ever lived. I'll have a ranch with a race car track and a golf course
en_quotes.author: Jeremy London

en_quotes.quote: My mum is a school teacher and my dad is an electrician
en_quotes.author: Jai Courtney

en_quotes.quote: I have always thought of Walt Disney as my second father
en_quotes.author: Annette Funicello

en_quotes.quote: I was brought up in a car family, my dad loved cars and I was taught the art of making an Austin 7 operate

en_quotes.quote: I saw 'The Shining' when I was too young with my dad in San Francisco in the hotel room
en_quotes.author: Daniel Zovatto

en_quotes.quote: I dug up my dad's old Fred Astaire tapes, and now I find him super-inspiring. He's, like, one of the best dancers
en_quotes.author: Adam G. Sevani

en_quotes.quote: When I was a kid I went and saw Bill Cosby with my dad, and I remember sitting there and laughing so hard
en_quotes.author: Dave Coulier

en_quotes.quote: My dad was like a stage mother he always pushed me to do what I wanted
en_quotes.author: Jim Carrey

en_quotes.quote: My dad thinks I have a photographic memory

en_quotes.quote: I stopped loving my father a long time ago. What remained was the slavery to a pattern
en_quotes.author: Anais Nin

en_quotes.quote: It is impossible to please all the world and one's father

en_quotes.quote: Undeservedly you will atone for the sins of your fathers
en_quotes.author: Horace

en_quotes.quote: There is too much fathering going on just now and there is no doubt about it fathers are depressing
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: Child-rearing is my main interest now. I'm a hands-on father
en_quotes.author: Sean Penn

en_quotes.quote: Making your dad happy is - especially for an Italian Catholic girl, I'll tell you - it feels really good
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: My father was grounded, a very meat-and-potatoes man. He was a baker

en_quotes.quote: The time not to become a father is eighteen years before a war
en_quotes.author: E. B. White

en_quotes.quote: My father... had sharper eyes than the rest of our people
en_quotes.author: Chief Joseph

en_quotes.quote: My father never raised his hand to any one of his children, except in self-defense
en_quotes.author: Fred Allen

en_quotes.quote: I would say the dumbest thing I have heard is that my dad isn't my real dad
en_quotes.author: Khloe Kardashian

en_quotes.quote: My Father had a profound influence on me. He was a lunatic
en_quotes.author: Spike Milligan

en_quotes.quote: I love the comic opportunities that come up in the context of a father-son relationship
en_quotes.author: Harrison Ford

en_quotes.quote: Because of his military service, Dad was buried in Arlington National Cemetery
en_quotes.author: Buzz Aldrin

en_quotes.quote: But the love of adventure was in father's blood
en_quotes.author: Buffalo Bill

en_quotes.quote: An angry father is most cruel towards himself
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: Don't forget Mother's Day. Or as they call it in Beverly Hills, Dad's Third Wife Day
en_quotes.author: Jay Leno

en_quotes.quote: My father wants me to be like my brother, but I can't be
en_quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

en_quotes.quote: I would never have done what I'd done if I'd considered my father as somebody I wanted to please
en_quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

en_quotes.quote: My dad was a diehard Cowboys fan. I was raised as a Cowboy fan, and I was forced to be a Cowboy fan

en_quotes.quote: I grew up not liking my father very much. I never saw him cry. But he must have. Everybody cries
en_quotes.author: Charley Pride

en_quotes.quote: I'm a fun father, but not a good father. The hard decisions always went to my wife
en_quotes.author: John Lithgow

en_quotes.quote: My dad was lackadaisical on the discipline front. I dropped out of everything at school
en_quotes.author: Juliette Lewis

en_quotes.quote: Nobody ever asks a father how he manages to combine marriage and a career
en_quotes.author: Sam Ewing

en_quotes.quote: My father was the guy on the block who said hi to everyone
en_quotes.author: Damon Wayans

en_quotes.quote: But I have to be careful not to let the world dazzle me so much that I forget that I'm a husband and a father
en_quotes.author: Herbie Hancock

en_quotes.quote: I wanted to take up music, so my father bought me a blunt instrument. He told me to knock myself out
en_quotes.author: Jay London

en_quotes.quote: American Dad' is, by its nature, much more political
en_quotes.author: Seth MacFarlane

en_quotes.quote: Being a father, being a friend, those are the things that make me feel successful
en_quotes.author: William Hurt

en_quotes.quote: My father was an Episcopalian minister, and I've always been comforted by the power of prayer
en_quotes.author: Anna Lee

en_quotes.quote: I was raised by free-spirited people, though my father gave me a very strong work ethic
en_quotes.author: Diane Lane

en_quotes.quote: Employee fathers need to step up to the plate and put their family needs on the table
en_quotes.author: James Levine

en_quotes.quote: Kids - young men find it uncool to be a dad, I think. It's very cool to me... I love being at home with my kids
en_quotes.author: Mark Henry

en_quotes.quote: Father told me that if I ever met a lady in a dress like yours, I must look her straight in the eyes
en_quotes.author: Prince Charles

en_quotes.quote: That is the thankless position of the father in the family - the provider for all, and the enemy of all
en_quotes.author: August Strindberg

en_quotes.quote: My dad is my biggest fan
en_quotes.author: Mannie Fresh

en_quotes.quote: A dramatic thing, the first time you stand up to your dad
en_quotes.author: Lenny Kravitz

en_quotes.quote: The surprising thing about fatherhood was finding my inner mush. Now I want to share it with the world
en_quotes.author: Christopher Meloni

en_quotes.quote: I grew up with the white picket fence. My dad went to work nine to five, and he had a station wagon

en_quotes.quote: Father or stepfather - those are just titles to me. They don't mean anything
en_quotes.author: Oliver Hudson

en_quotes.quote: Babies don't need fathers, but mothers do. Someone who is taking care of a baby needs to be taken care of
en_quotes.author: Amy Heckerling

en_quotes.quote: My father, he was like the rock, the guy you went to with every problem
en_quotes.author: Gwyneth Paltrow

en_quotes.quote: One of my earliest memories is of my father carrying me in one arm with a picket sign in the other
en_quotes.author: Camryn Manheim

en_quotes.quote: My dad always said, 'Don't worry what people think, because you can't change it.'
en_quotes.author: Daisy Donovan

en_quotes.quote: Thirteen, 13 children, and I love - I love them all. And I think I've been a good father to all of them
en_quotes.author: Anthony Quinn

en_quotes.quote: Watching your husband become a father is really sexy and wonderful
en_quotes.author: Cindy Crawford

en_quotes.quote: My dad is a nurse midwife, one of about only 50 male midwives in the U.S., I think

en_quotes.quote: One Christmas my father kept our tree up till March. He hated to see it go. I loved that
en_quotes.author: Mo Rocca

en_quotes.quote: My father invented a cure for which there was no disease and unfortunately my mother caught it and died of it
en_quotes.author: Victor Borge

en_quotes.quote: No, I never thought about my father's money as my money
en_quotes.author: Christie Hefner

en_quotes.quote: My old man tried to force on me a notion of what it was to be a 'man.' And it destroyed my dad
en_quotes.author: Sam Shepard

en_quotes.quote: A father is always making his baby into a little woman. And when she is a woman he turns her back again
en_quotes.author: Enid Bagnold

en_quotes.quote: When I was a kid, my dad went to World War II. I didn't know him. I was born in '41
en_quotes.author: Nick Nolte

en_quotes.quote: Dad was the only adult male I ever trusted
en_quotes.author: Michael Reagan

en_quotes.quote: A father's disappointment can be a very powerful tool
en_quotes.author: Michael Bergin

en_quotes.quote: My father was always telling himself no one was perfect, not even my mother
en_quotes.author: Broderick Crawford

en_quotes.quote: My father taught me how to substitute realities
en_quotes.author: Mira Sorvino

en_quotes.quote: My father was the most rational and the most dispassionate of men
en_quotes.author: Simon Newcomb

en_quotes.quote: My father loved people, children and pets
en_quotes.author: Tony Visconti

en_quotes.quote: My dad taught me true words you have to use in every relationship. Yes, baby
en_quotes.author: Star Jones

en_quotes.quote: Dad didn't wear the guns unless a report card came in that he didn't particularly dig
en_quotes.author: John Ritter

en_quotes.quote: The most important influence in my childhood was my father
en_quotes.author: DeForest Kelley

en_quotes.quote: I was punished for blowing the whistle on my father's lifestyle
en_quotes.author: Tatum O'Neal

en_quotes.quote: My father was something of a rainbow-chaser
en_quotes.author: Marc Davis

en_quotes.quote: Being a father to my family and a husband is to me much more important than what I did in the business
en_quotes.author: Tom Bosley

en_quotes.quote: When a father, absent during the day, returns home at six, his children receive only his temperament, not his teaching
en_quotes.author: Robert Bly

en_quotes.quote: No man is responsible for his father. That was entirely his mother's affair
en_quotes.author: Margaret Turnbull
